amendment.description: Amendment provides the VA with the authority to offer physicians conditional job offers two years earlier and increases the VA's recruiting outreach efforts to academic affiliate institutions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in House Report 114-742 to provide the VA with the authority to offer physicians conditional job offers two years earlier and increases the VA's recruiting outreach efforts to academic affiliate institutions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the O'Rourke amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the O'Rourke amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. O'Rourke.
